mapper.select: SELECT questionNo, questionTitle, questionContents, questionFile, questionDate, memberNo, answerStatus FROM (SELECT questionNo, questionTitle, questionContents, questionFile, questionDate, memberNo, answerStatus FROM QUESTION ORDER BY questionNo DESC) AS T1 LIMIT #{skip}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION (questionTitle, questionContents, questionFile, questionDate, memberNo, answerStatus) VALUES (#{questionTitle}, #{questionContents}, NULL, now(),#{memberNo}, '미답변')
